attributes.action: Coronation Street should be saved and used as tourist attraction
attributes.additional_details:
Having heard that it is to be demolished I suggest that the original set at Granda Studios in Manchester used to film over 50 years of episodes of Coronation Street should be saved.

I believe that it would more than pay for itself by attracting visitors from not only the UK but potentially around the world and would also provide additional income to the shops, hotels, transport providers and many other people in the area.
